newsitem.title: USA: Pacific Sunwear to open 40 stores in '97.
newsitem.headline: Pacific Sunwear to open 40 stores in '97.

text.p: Pacific Sunwear of California Inc said it will open 40 new stores in 1997.
It expects to end 1996 with 212 stores in operation and about 252 stores by the end of 1997.
It also said it will enlarge or relocate between 10-15 existing stores to accommodate the addition of junior merchandise and footwear.

"Based upon the success of juniors, footwear, the expansion of jeanswear in our stores, an 11 percent comparable increase year-to-date and strong financial performance, we have decided to accelerate our growth plans for 1997," Greg Weaver, chief operating officer said.
